chart.name: price.per.month
chart.title: Cover Chart
chart.dataset: SELECT self.name AS name, self.price AS price FROM Cover self

chart.name: people.per.mobile
chart.title: People per Mobile
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.name) AS mobile, _people.peopleName AS people FROM Mobile self LEFT JOIN self.people _people WHERE self.people IS NOT NULL GROUP BY self.name, _people.peopleName
